name: code2d
description: This extension helps users to add articles, YouTube videos, and books sold in Rakuten Books (https://books.rakuten.co.jp/) or Better World Books (https://www.betterworldbooks.com/) to to-do lists of code2d easily.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://apis.google.com; object-src 'self'
